body.body: Remove the sleeves from the drag link and pack the bearings with fresh grease to NLGI 2 specification. Refit the sleeve.
Remove the sleeve from the swinging arm and pack the bearing with fresh grease. Refit the sleeve.
Remove the sleeve from the rear suspension lower mounting and pack the bearing with fresh grease. Refit the sleeve.
Fit the drag link to the frame, fit its fixing from the left hand side and fit a new lock nut. Do not fully tighten at this stage.
Position the drop link plates as noted for removal and insert the fixings from the left hand side.
Fit new lock nuts but do not fully tighten at this stage.
With the weight of the motorcycle on its wheels, tighten the drag link and drop link lock nuts to
whilst holding the fixings in position.
